UX Toolset

To architect the experiences of tomorrow, we have to be able to work with the best tools available today. These are some of the tools and methodologies that I utilize to research, build, test and evaluate quality UX deliverables.

UX Methodologies

  • Visual and Interface Design
  • Wireframes and Mock ups
  • Interactive Prototypes
  • Microinteractions and motion design
  • Visual Identity and Styleguide Development
  • Design Systems
  • Sketching
  • Flow Charts
  • Usability Testing
  • User Stories
  • User Tests / Split Tests
  • Facilitate Design Sprints

Core Design and Development tools

Preferential Software

x

My name is Jarryd Wafer and I live in Amsterdam, NL where I currently work as a Product and UX designer for Booking.com where I manage a team of software developers for an agile product team in Boooking's Marketing department.

I am currently interested in new projects and interested in full-time work opportunities, speaking engagements, and teaching opportunities.

Have something that you would like to talk about? Get in touch. Maybe we will get to build something great together!

Jarryd Wafer
